reviews.review: Great game to hang out with your friends with and kill some time. If you want a competitive FPS and have people to team with, this game is enjoyable and can supply endless laughs and smiles. If you play this game alone, expect to be disappointed by your teammates and a majority of the time the player-base is Tier III toxic. Custom maps are great fun too!

Whats not there to like about CS:GO? There's so much that you're able to do, there's basically something for everyone to enjoy. From Bhopping, to hill climb, or just being competitive with friends and seeing who has the best shot. Overall 10/10 game and I strongly suggest giving it a chance!
